name: BubbleBounceBattle (BBB)
description:
Player1 - W, A, S, D       Player2- Keyboard Arrows

Bubble Bounce Battle is a hyper casual multiplayer action game where two players face each other. The playable characters are balls that bounce and roll, and the goal is to throw the opponent out of the arena six times. Scattered along the way are obstacles and power-ups that can be used for or against players.

Bubble Bounce Battle é um jogo hyper casual de ação multiplayer onde dois jogadores se enfrentam. Os personagens jogáveis são bolas que quicam e ricocheteiam e o objetivo é jogar o oponente para fora da arena. Espalhados pelo caminho existem obstáculos e power-ups que podem ser usados a favor ou contra os players.
